translations: 侦探猎犬；毫不放松的追赶着；侦探

sentences.sentence: This kid is a bloodhound. Look at her!
sentences.translation: 这孩子就是个侦探你看看她！

sentences.sentence: A full-scale model of the Bloodhound supersonic car was unveiled in Bristol, UK.
sentences.translation: 一辆1：1大小的“寻血猎犬”超音速汽车模型近日在英国布里斯托尔亮相。

sentences.sentence: The control method has been agreed for the "winglets" on the nose and tail of Bloodhound.
sentences.translation: 这种控制方法和猎犬号鼻翼和尾部所采用的翼翅向一致。
